description: Harness the power of your own personal wellness motivator. Simply ask Alexa for your pledge and start your day with that in mind. Get a new pledge every day and focus on that, bettering yourself more and more.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask daily pledge what's my daily pledge?
Alexa, ask daily pledge what's my pledge for today?
Alexa, tell daily pledge to give me a pledge for today.
name: Daily Pledge
shortDescription: Take a daily pledge to better health. Every day get tips and a clear goal for improving your health
